# Penguin Plots
## Install/Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Exmaple plot
```{r}
ggplot(data=penguins)+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=flipper_length_mm,y=body_mass_g, color = species)) + 
  facet_grid(sex~species)
```
